Package OODPg5

Class Table

java.lang.Object
OODPg5.Table
public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a table in the restaurant. Table can be used during the opening hours from 11:00-22:00 Table can be booked for 1 hour time slots
Author:
Group 5

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Table​(int TableNo, int numOfSeats)
    Creates a table in the restaurant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      public Table​(int TableNo, int numOfSeats)
      Creates a table in the restaurant. 1 hour time slots available for the table from 1100 to 2200
      Parameters:
      TableNo - Table number of the table
      numOfSeats - Number of seats available in the table

  • Method Details

    • getTableNo

      public int getTableNo()
      Get the table number of the table
      Returns:
      Table number of the table

    • getNumOfSeats

      public int getNumOfSeats()
      Get the number of seats available in the table
      Returns:
      Number of seats available in the table

    • getCustomer

      public Customer getCustomer()
      Get the customer assigned to table
      Returns:
      Customer assigned to table, null if table is free

    • getTimeSlots

      public java.util.ArrayList<TimeSlot> getTimeSlots()
      Get the array list of time slots
      Returns:
      Array list of time slots

    • assign

      public boolean assign​(Customer customer)
      Assign a customer to the table
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer to be assigned the table
      Returns:
      TRUE if customer is assigned the table

    • unAssign

      public void unAssign()
      Unassign the table, table is now free

    • printTableStatus

      public void printTableStatus​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Print the booking status for the table
      Parameters:
      date - Date of the booking status to be printed

    • bookSlot

      public boolean bookSlot​(Reservation reservation)
      Book a time slot for the table
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation booked for the table
      Returns:
      TRUE if time slot booked for the table

    • freeSlot

      public void freeSlot​(java.time.LocalTime startTime, java.time.LocalDate date)
      Free the time slot for the table
      Parameters:
      startTime - Starting time for the time slot to be freed
      date - Date of the time slot to be freed
